settings.label: List of Poster Condition Keywords
settings.default: advance, regular, international, limited edition, special edition, re-issued, re-release, linen backed, satin backed, glossy, Giclee, Crease, tear, fair condition, poor condition, damage, tape repair, pin holes, glued to lobby card, censor sticker, edge wear, used, sticker over rating, mint condition, excellent condition, good condition, near mint condition, near excellent condition, paper loss, fold line, print flaw, print burn, stain, residue, french overprint
